fr.gouv.vitam.storage.engine.server.storagelog

Interface StorageLog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, VitamAutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StorageLogFactory

    public interface StorageLog
extends VitamAutoCloseable
    Storage log provider. It describes methods to be implemented.
